metadata.title: Trump says he and Netanyahu are ‘war heroes’

left: Donald Trump called himself a 'war hero' during a radio interview, citing his approval of airstrikes on Iranian nuclear facilities as justification.
Trump called Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu a 'war hero' for their collaboration on military actions against Iran.
Critics, including former Congressman Adam Kinzinger, disputed Trump's claims, pointing out his past deferments during the Vietnam War.
The airstrikes escalated tensions between the U.S. and Iran, marking the first direct U.S. military attack on Iran.
center: Donald Trump called himself a 'war hero' during a radio interview, citing his approval of airstrikes on Iranian nuclear facilities as justification.
Trump called Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu a 'war hero' for their collaboration on military actions against Iran.
Critics, including former Congressman Adam Kinzinger, disputed Trump's claims, pointing out his past deferments during the Vietnam War.
The airstrikes escalated tensions between the U.S. and Iran, marking the first direct U.S. military attack on Iran.
right: U.S. President Donald Trump called Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu a 'war hero' during an interview with radio host Mark Levin, praising him for his work and leadership.
Trump claimed to have worked hard to secure the release of Israeli hostages held by Hamas, stating, 'I'm the one that got all the hostages back.'
Regarding Netanyahu's legal issues, Trump described the attempts to prosecute him as a 'witch hunt' and called for cancellation or pardon of his trial.
The humanitarian crisis in Gaza continues, with UN agencies reporting that famine thresholds have been reached and significant casualties recorded due to ongoing conflict.
